name: Ruined House
description:
You're in the remains of a ruined house. The upper floor has collapsed, leaving rubble everywhere. You can see blue sky above you. Amidst all the rubble there is a metal chest.
There's an exit to the north that leads back outside.

args: It's a metal storage chest. It's badly dented and scuffed but still in one piece. There's nothing inside.
It's a metal storage chest. It's badly dented and scuffed but still in one piece. There's a heavy-duty flashlight inside.
It's a metal storage chest. It's badly dented and scuffed but still in one piece. It's shut tight.
You clear some rubble off the top of the metal chest and open it. There's a heavy-duty flashlight inside.

use: You can't use that. Try opening it instead.

take: You take the flashlight from the metal chest.
